msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Grid, GridLayout Performance optimzation aimed at reducing the cost of hover and selection indicator changes, and the cost of vertical scrolls.
Added a new internal Grid API that tracks the "reasons" for invalidateDisplayList() calls.  GridLayout uses the list of reasons to economize layout work.
No longer invalidating the columnHeaderGroup skin part for vertical scrolls; correcting a problem introduced in SVN 18468.
QE notes: ..DataGrid/Performance/GridSelectionToggleRowSelect_test needs to be revised, has been excluded for now
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
ASDoc updates for DataGrid, part II
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fix for RTE when sorting complex datafields. Added an internal GridSortField class that captures the full dataField when sorting on a complex dataField. This is required because sort currently RTE's when the dataField is set to a property that doesn't exist on the data object even though a sortCompareFunction is defined. I've also changed the default compare function for complex dataFields to compare the data instead of using the itemToLabel function. I've modified DataGrid to take advantage of GridSortField for figuring out when to reverse the sort of a column with a complex dataField.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
DataGrid now adds GridEvent listeners to its grid skin part at EventPriority.DEFAULT_HANDLER; the listeners short-circuit if their event has been cancelled.
QE notes: unrelated test, spark/primitives/Graphic/SWFs/FXG_Integration consistently crashes FP on cyclone server
